content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    code_blocks = filter(block -> block.startswith("```"), split(md, "\n\n")))

    extracted_codes = join(code_blocks, "\n"), "") # Join code blocks with newline

    return extracted_codes
end
```

The `extract_julia_code` function takes a markdown document as input (`md`). It uses the `filter` function to keep only the code blocks (detected by their starting "```"). 

Then, it joins these code blocks together with a newline using the `join` function.

Finally, it returns the extracted Julia code as a single String.
